testcase.name: To check the Logout functionality with invalid credentials - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the browser................................................passed And User navigates to the URL "https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com/"...passed When User clicks the link "Sign In".........................................passed And User enters invalid email "testuser@gmail.com" and password "12345678"..passed And User clicks the "Sign In" button........................................passed Then User should see an error message "The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later.".passed
